Quote.Author: Edgar Bronfman, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I remind everybody that the Sabbath was the Jewish gift to civilization

Quote.Author: Edgar Bronfman, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: No one said anything to my face, but I constantly heard comments denigrating Jews

Quote.Author: Edgar Bronfman, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I would like every Jew to be as comfortable in his skin as I am in mine

Quote.Author: Edgar Bronfman, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: In terms of defending Jews, I'm a Jew

Quote.Author: Edgar Bronfman, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: The Jews' fear of assimilation and intermarriage should not replace fear of anti-Semitism

Quote.Author: Edgar Bronfman, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had three wives. I've had five weddings

Quote.Author: Edgar Bronfman, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: My father put it right when he said: 'I don't get ulcers. I give ulcers.'

Quote.Author: Edgar Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's good to have pressure on yourself. The worst crime is to get kind of really complacent

Quote.Author: Edgar Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever I'm writing a script, I'm scoring myself by playing the right kind of music

Quote.Author: Edgar Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I use music to focus, like an internal motor

Quote.Author: Edgar Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're on a road trip, you need driving music

Quote.Author: Edgar Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I am always watching old films and trying to fill gaps in my knowledge

Quote.Author: Edgar Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather try and cram in another two gags than leave a pause to say, 'Hey, wasn't that bit funny?'

Quote.Author: Edgar Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: When I am not working, I try to watch more than one film a day if I can

Quote.Author: Edgar Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I tire of franchises, remakes, and endless sequels

Quote.Author: Edgar Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: Wes Anderson deserves an award for sheer persistence of vision

Quote.Author: Edgar Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes, some things have to settle, and you have to think about the intention of it

Quote.Author: Edie Falco
Quote.QuoteValue: Coming home to my family afterward makes the work richer, easier and more fun

Quote.Author: Edie Falco
Quote.QuoteValue: In my household there is an insane amount of laughter and celebration

Quote.Author: Edie Falco
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being able to take a nap in the afternoon

Quote.Author: Edie Falco
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up kind of a tomboy and I used to fight with all the neighborhood boys

Quote.Author: Edie Falco
Quote.QuoteValue: I actually washed my window once, and it fell through - it was being held together by the dirt

Quote.Author: Edie Falco
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to notice things without people noticing me and that takes some getting used to

Quote.Author: Edie Falco
Quote.QuoteValue: My actual personality probably lies someplace between the two

Quote.Author: Edie Falco
Quote.QuoteValue: The world gets very small after a while, if you stick around long enough

Quote.Author: Edie Falco
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a little good and bad in everyone. Everybody I've ever loved is very complicated

Quote.Author: Edie Falco
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the ways I think I gain fodder for characters is by watching people

Quote.Author: Edith Head
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is a language. Some know it, some learn it, some never will - like an instinct

Quote.Author: Edith Head
Quote.QuoteValue: You can have anything you want in life if you dress for it

Quote.Author: Edith Head
Quote.QuoteValue: Your dresses should be tight enough to show you're a woman and loose enough to show you're a lady

Quote.Author: Edith Head
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people need sequins, others don't

Quote.Author: Edith Head
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no such thing as a standard size movie star, or woman for that matter

Quote.Author: Edith Head
Quote.QuoteValue: My motto is that the audience should notice the actors, not the clothes

Quote.Author: Edith Head
Quote.QuoteValue: Before you are interviewed for the job you want, try on the complete outfit you intend to wear

Quote.Author: Edith Head
Quote.QuoteValue: A designer is only as good as the star who wears her clothes

Quote.Author: Edith Head
Quote.QuoteValue: I have yet to see one completely unspoiled star, except for the animals - like Lassie

Quote.Author: Edith Head
Quote.QuoteValue: I have yet to see one completely unspoiled star, except for Lassie

Quote.Author: Edith Wharton
Quote.QuoteValue: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it

Quote.Author: Edith Wharton
Quote.QuoteValue: My little dog - a heartbeat at my feet

Quote.Author: Edith Wharton
Quote.QuoteValue: To be able to look life in the face: that's worth living in a garret for, isn't it?

Quote.Author: Edith Wharton
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is always a tightrope or a feather bed. Give me the tightrope

Quote.Author: Edith Wharton
Quote.QuoteValue: A New York divorce is in itself a diploma of virtue

Quote.Author: Edith Wharton
Quote.QuoteValue: If only we'd stop trying to be happy we'd have a pretty good time

Quote.Author: Edith Wharton
Quote.QuoteValue: Beware of monotony; it's the mother of all the deadly sins

Quote.Author: Edith Wharton
Quote.QuoteValue: True originality consists not in a new manner but in a new vision

Quote.Author: Edith Wharton
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way not to think about money is to have a great deal of it

Quote.Author: Edith Wharton
Quote.QuoteValue: The air of ideas is the only air worth breathing

Quote.Author: Edmund Hillary
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves

Quote.Author: Edmund Hillary
Quote.QuoteValue: Human life is far more important than just getting to the top of a mountain

Quote.Author: Edmund Hillary
Quote.QuoteValue: People do not decide to become extraordinary. They decide to accomplish extraordinary things

Quote.Author: Edmund Hillary
Quote.QuoteValue: Life's a bit like mountaineering - never look down

Quote.Author: Edmund Hillary
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoyed climbing with other people, good friends, but I did quite a lot of solo climbing, too

Quote.Author: Edmund Hillary
Quote.QuoteValue: No one remembers who climbed Mount Everest the second time

Quote.Author: Edmund Hillary
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not a real adventure when you have to pay for it

Quote.Author: Edmund Hillary
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth is, I'm just a rough old New Zealander who has enjoyed many challenges in his life

Quote.Author: Edmund Hillary
Quote.QuoteValue: Adventuring can be for the ordinary person with ordinary qualities, such as I regard myself

Quote.Author: Edmund Hillary
Quote.QuoteValue: On the summit of Everest, I had a feeling of great satisfaction to be first there

Quote.Author: Edmund Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: A nation's economy is more than its markets, tastes, technologies and property rights

Quote.Author: Edmund Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: Democrats and Republicans have been very keen to make home ownership almost a national purpose

Quote.Author: Edmund Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a teenager, I learned to play the trumpet. Music became my passion

Quote.Author: Edmund Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't do my work for money or prizes - only for the excitement of discovery

Quote.Author: Edmund Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: Expertise and judgment in the art of lending for novel ventures must be reacquired

Quote.Author: Edmund Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: Statistical studies are all over the lot about the pluses and minuses of raising the minimum wage

Quote.Author: Edmund Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think the economy telegraphs very clearly where it's going

Quote.Author: Edmund Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: An economy open to new concepts and novel ventures is bound to generate unequal gains

Quote.Author: Edmund Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: Italy and France could lop off their excessive wealth through a one-time tax on private wealth

Quote.Author: Edmund Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: My God, I don't know anyone who likes to accumulate their wealth more than the Europeans

Quote.Author: Edmund White
Quote.QuoteValue: I think sincerity was my sole aesthetic and realism my experimental technique

Quote.Author: Edmund White
Quote.QuoteValue: Of course the success of A Boy's Own Story took me utterly off guard

Quote.Author: Edmund White
Quote.QuoteValue: Just like Barack Obama, my views on gay marriage have evolved, and now I am a reluctant groom

Quote.Author: Edmund White
Quote.QuoteValue: These rejections hurt me terribly because I felt it was my life that was being rejected

Quote.Author: Edmund White
Quote.QuoteValue: It always seemed much better to be a writer - a Real Writer - than a successful hack

Quote.Author: Edmund White
Quote.QuoteValue: I was never an assimilationist. I always thought gays had some special mission

Quote.Author: Edmund White
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have to get married myself in order to campaign on behalf of gay marriage

Quote.Author: Edmund White
Quote.QuoteValue: Most writers tend to get worse rather than better. I'm determined to be one that gets better

Quote.Author: Edmund White
Quote.QuoteValue: In a memoir, your main contract with the reader is to tell the truth, no matter how bizarre

Quote.Author: Edmund White
Quote.QuoteValue: The Internet's impact is immense. My students can't imagine ever paying for a book

Quote.Author: Edna St. Vincent Millay
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty is whatever gives joy

Quote.Author: Edna St. Vincent Millay
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not true that life is one damn thing after another; it's one damn thing over and over

Quote.Author: Edna St. Vincent Millay
Quote.QuoteValue: God, I can push the grass apart and lay my finger on Thy heart

Quote.Author: Edna St. Vincent Millay
Quote.QuoteValue: Set the foot down with distrust on the crust of the world - it is thin

Quote.Author: Edna St. Vincent Millay
Quote.QuoteValue: Childhood is the kingdom where nobody dies. Nobody that matters, that is

Quote.Author: Edna St. Vincent Millay
Quote.QuoteValue: The soul can split the sky in two and let the face of God shine through

Quote.Author: Edna St. Vincent Millay
Quote.QuoteValue: The longest absence is less perilous to love than the terrible trials of incessant proximity

Quote.Author: Edna St. Vincent Millay
Quote.QuoteValue: Not truth, but faith, it is that keeps the world alive

Quote.Author: Edna St. Vincent Millay
Quote.QuoteValue: The young are so old, they are born with their fingers crossed

Quote.Author: Edna St. Vincent Millay
Quote.QuoteValue: Please give me some good advice in your next letter. I promise not to follow it

Quote.Author: Edsger Dijkstra
Quote.QuoteValue: Computer science is no more about computers than astronomy is about telescopes

Quote.Author: Edsger Dijkstra
Quote.QuoteValue: Mathematicians are like managers - they want improvement without change

Quote.Author: Edsger Dijkstra
Quote.QuoteValue: Program testing can be used to show the presence of bugs, but never to show their absence!

Quote.Author: Edsger Dijkstra
Quote.QuoteValue: There should be no such thing as boring mathematics

Quote.Author: Edsger Dijkstra
Quote.QuoteValue: Simplicity is prerequisite for reliability

Quote.Author: Edsger Dijkstra
Quote.QuoteValue: Aim for brevity while avoiding jargon

Quote.Author: Edsger Dijkstra
Quote.QuoteValue: The ability of discerning high quality unavoidably implies the ability of identifying shortcomings

Quote.Author: Edsger Dijkstra
Quote.QuoteValue: Elegance is not a dispensable luxury but a factor that decides between success and failure

Quote.Author: Edsger Dijkstra
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't compete with me: firstly, I have more experience, and secondly, I have chosen the weapons

Quote.Author: Edsger Dijkstra
Quote.QuoteValue: Perfecting oneself is as much unlearning as it is learning

Quote.Author: Eduardo Galeano
Quote.QuoteValue: History never really says goodbye. History says, 'See you later.'

Quote.Author: Eduardo Galeano
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all mortal until the first kiss and the second glass of wine

Quote.Author: Eduardo Galeano
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of wars or military coups or invasions are done in the name of democracy against democracy

Quote.Author: Eduardo Galeano
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm attracted to soccer's capacity for beauty. When well played, the game is a dance with a ball

Quote.Author: Eduardo Galeano
Quote.QuoteValue: The purpose of torture is not getting information. It's spreading fear

Quote.Author: Eduardo Galeano
Quote.QuoteValue: I am quite prehistoric, absolutely prehistoric

Quote.Author: Eduardo Galeano
Quote.QuoteValue: The walls are the publishers of the poor

Quote.Author: Eduardo Galeano
Quote.QuoteValue: If nature were a bank, they would have already rescued it

Quote.Author: Eduardo Galeano
Quote.QuoteValue: From 8 A.M. until noon, I am pessimistic. Then from 1 P.M. until 4, I feel optimistic

Quote.Author: Eduardo Galeano
Quote.QuoteValue: We Latins are known for jabbering on

Quote.Author: Edward Abbey
Quote.QuoteValue: When a man's best friend is his dog, that dog has a problem

Quote.Author: Edward Abbey
Quote.QuoteValue: Wilderness is not a luxury but a necessity of the human spirit

Quote.Author: Edward Abbey
Quote.QuoteValue: A patriot must always be ready to defend his country against his government

Quote.Author: Edward Abbey
Quote.QuoteValue: Power is always dangerous. Power attracts the worst and corrupts the best

Quote.Author: Edward Abbey
Quote.QuoteValue: The idea of wilderness needs no defense, it only needs defenders

Quote.Author: Edward Abbey
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't study the darkness by flooding it with light

Quote.Author: Edward Abbey
Quote.QuoteValue: Growth for the sake of growth is the ideology of the cancer cell

Quote.Author: Edward Abbey
Quote.QuoteValue: Belief in the supernatural reflects a failure of the imagination

Quote.Author: Edward Abbey
Quote.QuoteValue: Our culture runs on coffee and gasoline, the first often tasting like the second

Quote.Author: Edward Abbey
Quote.QuoteValue: If the end does not justify the means - what can?

Quote.Author: Edward de Bono
Quote.QuoteValue: Logic will never change emotion or perception

Quote.Author: Edward de Bono
Quote.QuoteValue: Humor is by far the most significant activity of the human brain

Quote.Author: Edward de Bono
Quote.QuoteValue: Teaching thinking for just five hours to unemployed youngsters increased employment 500 percent

Quote.Author: Edward de Bono
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of the mistakes in thinking are inadequacies of perception rather than mistakes of logic

Quote.Author: Edward de Bono
Quote.QuoteValue: A memory is what is left when something happens and does not completely unhappen

Quote.Author: Edward de Bono
Quote.QuoteValue: Argument is meant to reveal the truth, not to create it

Quote.Author: Edward de Bono
Quote.QuoteValue: If you wait for opportunities to occur, you will be one of the crowd

Quote.Author: Edward de Bono
Quote.QuoteValue: People should realize we're jerks just like them

Quote.Author: Edward de Bono
Quote.QuoteValue: If you never change your mind, why have one?

Quote.Author: Edward de Bono
Quote.QuoteValue: Unhappiness is best defined as the difference between our talents and our expectations

Quote.Author: Edward G. Bulwe
Quote.QuoteValue: ytton - Talent does what it can; genius does what it must

Quote.Author: Edward G. Bulwe
Quote.QuoteValue: ytton - Anger ventilated often hurries towards forgiveness; anger concealed often hardens into revenge

Quote.Author: Edward G. Bulwe
Quote.QuoteValue: ytton - The pen is mightier than the sword

Quote.Author: Edward G. Bulwe
Quote.QuoteValue: ytton - In life, as in art, the beautiful moves in curves

Quote.Author: Edward G. Bulwe
Quote.QuoteValue: ytton - A good heart is better than all the heads in the world

Quote.Author: Edward G. Bulwe
Quote.QuoteValue: ytton - Power is so characteristically calm, that calmness in itself has the aspect of strength

Quote.Author: Edward G. Bulwe
Quote.QuoteValue: ytton - Love thou the rose, yet leave it on its stem

Quote.Author: Edward G. Bulwe
Quote.QuoteValue: ytton - Truth makes on the ocean of nature no one track of light; every eye, looking on, finds its own

Quote.Author: Edward G. Bulwe
Quote.QuoteValue: ytton - Beneath the rule of men entirely great, the pen is mightier than the sword

Quote.Author: Edward G. Bulwe
Quote.QuoteValue: ytton - The easiest person to deceive is one's self

Quote.Author: Edward Gibbon
Quote.QuoteValue: Revenge is profitable, gratitude is expensive

Quote.Author: Edward Gibbon
Quote.QuoteValue: Fanaticism obliterates the feelings of humanity

Quote.Author: Edward Gibbon
Quote.QuoteValue: Hope, the best comfort of our imperfect condition

Quote.Author: Edward Gibbon
Quote.QuoteValue: The winds and the waves are always on the side of the ablest navigators

Quote.Author: Edward Gibbon
Quote.QuoteValue: History is indeed little more than the register of the crimes, follies, and misfortunes of mankind

Quote.Author: Edward Gibbon
Quote.QuoteValue: History is little more than the register of the crimes, follies, and misfortunes of mankind

Quote.Author: Edward Gibbon
Quote.QuoteValue: Our work is the presentation of our capabilities

Quote.Author: Edward Gibbon
Quote.QuoteValue: The courage of a soldier is found to be the cheapest and most common quality of human nature

Quote.Author: Edward Gibbon
Quote.QuoteValue: Conversation enriches the understanding, but solitude is the school of genius

Quote.Author: Edward Gibbon
Quote.QuoteValue: The laws of probability, so true in general, so fallacious in particular

Quote.Author: Edward Hopper
Quote.QuoteValue: If you could say it in words there would be no reason to paint

Quote.Author: Edward Hopper
Quote.QuoteValue: More of me comes out when I improvise

Quote.Author: Edward Hopper
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that zinc white has a property of scaling and cracking

Quote.Author: Edward Hopper
Quote.QuoteValue: What I wanted to do was to paint sunlight on the side of a house

Quote.Author: Edward Hopper
Quote.QuoteValue: The question of the value of nationality in art is perhaps unsolvable

Quote.Author: Edward Hopper
Quote.QuoteValue: No amount of skillful invention can replace the essential element of imagination

Quote.Author: Edward Hopper
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a sort of elation about sunlight on the upper part of a house

Quote.Author: Edward Hopper
Quote.QuoteValue: I trust Winsor and Newton and I paint directly upon it

Quote.Author: Edward Hopper
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe I am not very human - what I wanted to do was to paint sunlight on the side of a house

Quote.Author: Edward Hopper
Quote.QuoteValue: I use a retouching varnish which is made in France, Libert, and that's all the varnish I use

Quote.Author: Edward Norton
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of why I do something is just the novelty of the experience

Quote.Author: Edward Norton
Quote.QuoteValue: Duality is not a story. Duality is just a complexity

Quote.Author: Edward Norton
Quote.QuoteValue: It's better for people to miss you than to have seen too much of you

Quote.Author: Edward Norton
Quote.QuoteValue: Life, like poker has an element of risk. It shouldn't be avoided. It should be faced

Quote.Author: Edward Norton
Quote.QuoteValue: I almost forgot what it's like to be proud of my government

Quote.Author: Edward Norton
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't smoke and I don't want to smoke. I am not a fan of gratuitous smoking in films

Quote.Author: Edward Norton
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you can create that magic bubble, that suspension of disbelief, for a while, the better

Quote.Author: Edward Norton
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'm trying to put size on for a role, then I don't do much running

Quote.Author: Edward Norton
Quote.QuoteValue: Identical twins are endemically alike in many ways

Quote.Author: Edward Norton
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have anything to prove to anybody, which is a lovely place to be

Quote.Author: Edward R. Murrow
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who isn't confused really doesn't understand the situation

Quote.Author: Edward R. Murrow
Quote.QuoteValue: Good night, and good luck

Quote.Author: Edward R. Murrow
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot defend freedom abroad by deserting it at home

Quote.Author: Edward R. Murrow
Quote.QuoteValue: Just once in a while let us exalt the importance of ideas and information

Quote.Author: Edward R. Murrow
Quote.QuoteValue: Our major obligation is not to mistake slogans for solutions

Quote.Author: Edward R. Murrow
Quote.QuoteValue: The obscure we see eventually. The completely obvious, it seems, takes longer

Quote.Author: Edward R. Murrow
Quote.QuoteValue: No one can terrorize a whole nation, unless we are all his accomplices

Quote.Author: Edward R. Murrow
Quote.QuoteValue: Difficulty is the excuse history never accepts

Quote.Author: Edward R. Murrow
Quote.QuoteValue: People say conversation is a lost art; how often I have wished it were

Quote.Author: Edward R. Murrow
Quote.QuoteValue: A satellite has no conscience

Quote.Author: Edward Snowden
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no intention of hiding who I am because I know I have done nothing wrong

Quote.Author: Edward Snowden
Quote.QuoteValue: Even if you're not doing anything wrong, you are being watched and recorded

Quote.Author: Edward Snowden
Quote.QuoteValue: I understand that I will be made to suffer for my actions

Quote.Author: Edward Snowden
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes the scandal is not what law was broken, but what the law allows

Quote.Author: Edward Snowden
Quote.QuoteValue: I would rather be without a state than without a voice

Quote.Author: Edward Snowden
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no regrets

Quote.Author: Edward Snowden
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not expect to see home again, though that is what I want

Quote.Author: Edward Snowden
Quote.QuoteValue: My intention is to ask the courts and people of Hong Kong to decide my fate

Quote.Author: Edward Snowden
Quote.QuoteValue: I have had no contact with the Chinese government. I only work with journalists

Quote.Author: Edward Snowden
Quote.QuoteValue: The NSA and Israel wrote Stuxnet together

Quote.Author: Edward Tufte
Quote.QuoteValue: The minimum we should hope for with any display technology is that it should do no harm

Quote.Author: Edward Tufte
Quote.QuoteValue: There are many true statements about complex topics that are too long to fit on a PowerPoint slide

Quote.Author: Edward Tufte
Quote.QuoteValue: If you like overheads, you'll love PowerPoint

Quote.Author: Edward Tufte
Quote.QuoteValue: The point of the essay is to change things

Quote.Author: Edward Tufte
Quote.QuoteValue: My father worked for governments all his life as an engineer and public works director

Quote.Author: Edward Tufte
Quote.QuoteValue: The leading edge in evidence presentation is in science; the leading edge in beauty is in high art

Quote.Author: Edward Tufte
Quote.QuoteValue: Beautiful Evidence is about the theory and practice of analytical design

Quote.Author: Edward Tufte
Quote.QuoteValue: The goal is to provide analytical tools that will last students a lifetime

Quote.Author: Edward Tufte
Quote.QuoteValue: A practical part of my teaching is to provide demonstrative, hands-on experiences

Quote.Author: Edward Tufte
Quote.QuoteValue: I am certainly not an intellectual relativist, nor a moral relativist

Quote.Author: Edward Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Procrastination is the thief of time

Quote.Author: Edward Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Revere thyself, and yet thyself despise

Quote.Author: Edward Young
Quote.QuoteValue: How blessings brighten as they take their flight

Quote.Author: Edward Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Some for renown, on scraps of learning dote, And think they grow immortal as they quote

Quote.Author: Edward Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Tomorrow is the day when idlers work, and fools reform

Quote.Author: Edward Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Tomorrow is a satire on today, And shows its weakness

Quote.Author: Edward Young
Quote.QuoteValue: The future... seems to me no unified dream but a mince pie, long in the baking, never quite done

Quote.Author: Edward Young
Quote.QuoteValue: A soul without reflection, like a pile Without inhabitant, to ruin runs

Quote.Author: Edward Young
Quote.QuoteValue: They only babble who practise not reflection

Quote.Author: Edward Young
Quote.QuoteValue: By all means use some time to be alone

Quote.Author: Edward Zwick
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to make choices always. It's about the omission of something for the sake of another

Quote.Author: Edward Zwick
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't help but reveal your bias, and you can't but invest personally in any story that you tell

Quote.Author: Edward Zwick
Quote.QuoteValue: Often, romantic comedies exist in a vacuum, and it's kind of odd

Quote.Author: Edward Zwick
Quote.QuoteValue: Forgive me, but what is the purpose of drama but catharsis?

Quote.Author: Edward Zwick
Quote.QuoteValue: One resists categorization at one's peril

Quote.Author: Edward Zwick
Quote.QuoteValue: People who have any kind of illness use humor as a type of coping

Quote.Author: Edward Zwick
Quote.QuoteValue: Adolescence is a time in which you experience everything more intensely

Quote.Author: Edward Zwick
Quote.QuoteValue: Anorexia is pernicious and not something which goes away overnight

Quote.Author: Edward Zwick
Quote.QuoteValue: Movies, as I grew up loving them, were always about something

Quote.Author: Edward Zwick
Quote.QuoteValue: I, for one, suffer from a little bit of superhero fatigue

Quote.Author: Edwin Louis Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't drown by falling in the water; you drown by staying there

Quote.Author: Edwin Louis Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: The pattern of the prodigal is: rebellion, ruin, repentance, reconciliation, restoration

Quote.Author: Edwin Louis Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: Prayer in private results in boldness in public

Quote.Author: Edwin Louis Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: Have faith in God; God has faith in you

Quote.Author: Edwin Louis Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: Obedience is an act of faith; disobedience is the result of unbelief

Quote.Author: Edwin Louis Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: Attitude determines the altitude of life

Quote.Author: Edwin Louis Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: Confidentiality is a virtue of the loyal, as loyalty is the virtue of faithfulness

Quote.Author: Edwin Louis Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: Your faithfulness makes you trustworthy to God

Quote.Author: Edwin Louis Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: Expectancy is the atmosphere for miracles

Quote.Author: Edwin Louis Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: God never ends anything on a negative; God always ends on a positive

Quote.Author: Ehud Barak
Quote.QuoteValue: If I were a Palestinian of the right age, I'd eventually join one of the terrorist organizations

Quote.Author: Ehud Barak
Quote.QuoteValue: Iran poses the most serious long-term threat to regional stability

Quote.Author: Ehud Barak
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't do anything to impress anyone, quite successfully I can tell you

Quote.Author: Ehud Barak
Quote.QuoteValue: Leadership can change its mind; leadership can open its eye. Leadership can even be replaced

Quote.Author: Ehud Barak
Quote.QuoteValue: We want peace, but not at any price

Quote.Author: Ehud Barak
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm such a failed politician that all of my rivals have disappeared, on both sides

Quote.Author: Ehud Barak
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't feel opportunistic ever, in anything

Quote.Author: Ehud Barak
Quote.QuoteValue: History never repeats itself in the same way

Quote.Author: Ehud Barak
Quote.QuoteValue: An independent, strong, thriving and peaceful State of Israel is the vengeance of the dead

Quote.Author: Ehud Barak
Quote.QuoteValue: I know that I am absolutely reliable. Absolutely

Quote.Author: Ehud Olmert
Quote.QuoteValue: Dictates are futile, and mutual accusations are nothing but useless word games

Quote.Author: Ehud Olmert
Quote.QuoteValue: Historic scores cannot be settled, and scars cannot be obliterated

Quote.Author: Ehud Olmert
Quote.QuoteValue: A prime minister must not promise things that can't be fulfilled

Quote.Author: Ehud Olmert
Quote.QuoteValue: I love my country more than anything else

Quote.Author: Ehud Olmert
Quote.QuoteValue: When you fight for the impossible, sometimes you lose everything

Quote.Author: Ehud Olmert
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wake up early Saturday morning, and I have a little bit more time, so I go to the gym

Quote.Author: Ehud Olmert
Quote.QuoteValue: There is always a human being behind the titles and the status

Quote.Author: Ehud Olmert
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to make sure that I am doing the right thing. I can't afford to make any mistake

Quote.Author: Ehud Olmert
Quote.QuoteValue: Barack Obama's journey to the White House has impressed and inspired the entire world

Quote.Author: Ehud Olmert
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like this terminology that you have no choice. You always have a choice

Quote.Author: Elaine Chao
Quote.QuoteValue: Typically, after moving backwards, the economy takes even more steps forward

Quote.Author: Elaine Chao
Quote.QuoteValue: When there's change, people are always anxious

Quote.Author: Elaine Chao
Quote.QuoteValue: As I looked up at the Statue of Liberty, I thought at that time, 'What a wonderful country.'
